example[1]: Residents in the area are furious at the decision.
example[2]: She was furious with herself for letting things get out of hand.
example[3]: Her family are furious that her name has been published by the press.
definition[1]: done with a lot of energy, effort, or speed
example[4]: Neil set off at a furious pace.
example[5]: The action is fast and furious.
example[6]: There was a furious row over the proposals.
